snippet: Chelsea failed to capitalize fully on Manchester City’s stumble in the Premier League title race, settling for a 1-1 draw with visiting Southampton, while Manchester United defeated Tottenham, 3-0, at home.
abstract: Chelsea ties Manchester City, 1-1, in Premiere League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chelsea failed to capitalize fully on Manchester City’s stumble in the Premier League title race, settling for a 1-1 draw with visiting Southampton, while Manchester United defeated Tottenham, 3-0, at home.
